b766dae19e2d.title: One point- the label “bathroom law” doesn’t fully describe impact.

paragraphs.text: One point- the label “bathroom law” doesn’t fully describe impact. In the widest application, these laws would allow any man to enter a women’s (or girl’s in the case of a school) locker room with open showers legally by claiming they are they are trans-gender. Is this what you want?
paragraphs.name: f172
